name: Won't You Be My Laser?
description: An 80s-themed puzzle game in which you avoid the line of sight of lethal gun turrets... while acquiring pick-up sticks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible or integrated sound chip Additional Notes: Screen resolution minimum 960x540, recommended 1920x1080

reviews.review_text: A simple design game that test our persistence and finger agility. No options, no configurations, just enter the stages and begin.  Have to run each stages repeatedly. First to gather all the sticks and heading to the exit while mapping the path, second is to repeat the process of heading to the exit till you Ace the stage, or vice versa.   Test of endurance with zero error of mistake, every keypress is crucial, every milliseconds counts. Prepare to get your fingers numb.   The price is moderately low, Recommend to try if you have the patience. Good Game.
I played for 20 mins, got horribly bored and refunded. Time you see is from afk.
